divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on the deck of my brother's house in Sargent and noticed in the northeast sky, just to the left of a cell phone tower aviation warning light, a stationary bright reddish light that at first I thought was Mars. After a few minutes it became brighter and the hue changed slightly. As soon as I told my father to look at it, the object went dark. I kept looking for it but it never returned.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Sargent
This sighting has never been favorited.
